Title:
Two novel Tuber species (Tuberaceae, Pezizales) in the
Latisporum Group from China
Keywords: Latisporum group, Phylogeny, Taxonomy, White truffles
Abstract:
Recent taxonomic and molecular studies on Tuber in China
have revealed several new species. Here we propose Tuber
polymorphosporum and T. baoshanense as new species. These species are
described from Yunnan Province and differ in a combination of
morphologically features including ascoma color, peridium structure and
ascospore shape and size. These two new taxa have phylogenetic affinity
to T. latisporum and T. alboumbilicum, respectively, described from the
southwest China. Phylogenetic placement of these novel Tuber species in
the Latisporum group are presented here.
